alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Diego County through 215 PM PDT... At 143 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, Lake Cuyamaca, Hwy S1 Between Lake Cuyamaca And Mount Laguna, Hwy 79 Between Julian And Lake Cuyamaca, Descanso, Boulder Creek, and Guatay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
